name: Shake Canyon
description:
Hi guys,

You are in a space ship flying over a canyon. When crossing the canyon you encounter the SCDF or Shake Canyon Defence Force. Will you be able to survive the encounter.

This game features 4 different enemies, each with their own characteristics. This also has a lot of screen shake :)

Mac and Linux version coming soon.

Controls-

Right - Right Key or D

Left - Left Key or A

Shoot - LMB or Spacebar

For Mobile just hold the side of the screen that you want to move
